regen.absent_element: user confirmation or error messages post-operation execution
regen.new_specification: The system shall display confirmation or error messages following project creation, editing, deletion, item assignment/removal, or project splitting to ensure user awareness of success or failure of actions.

regen.absent_element: confirmation and notification of changes to projects or work items
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide confirmation to the user when a project is created, edited, deleted, split, or when work items are assigned or removed from a project.
The system shall notify users upon the successful creation, editing, deletion, assignment, or removal of work items within a project, and when a project is split into multiple projects.

label: The user shall be able to combine multiple projects into a master project.
absence: action of combining multiple projects into a master project
